doc:
Josephine Lovett https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josephine_Lovett 0 Josephine Lovett (October 21, 1877 – September 17, 1958) was an American scenario writer, adapter, screenwriter and actress, active in films from 1916 to 1935. She was married to Canadian-born director, John Stewart Robertson. She is best known for her then-risqué film Our Dancing Daughters in 1928. Her screenplays typically included a heroine who was oftentimes economically and sexually independent. Josephine_Lovett ( October_21_,_1877 – September_17_,_1958 ) was an_American_scenario_writer , adapter , screenwriter_and_actress , active in films from 1916 to 1935 . She was_married to Canadian-born_director , John_Stewart_Robertson . She is_best_known for her_then-risqué_film Our_Dancing_Daughters in 1928 . Her_screenplays typically included a_heroine who was oftentimes economically_and_sexually independent .
